instruction: Can you explain the additional trade-offs highlighted in the variant relationships on the right side of the exhibit regarding increasing the weight to the MSCI ACWI Value Index?
output: Sure, increasing the weight to the MSCI ACWI Value Index resulted in less thematic exposure, lower valuation, and higher risk compared to the baseline of MSCI ACWI. We also measured the sensitivity of increasing the weight of any index on thematic exposure, valuation, and risk over the same period.
